name: Bonebreaker

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Dex 13, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, Jawbreaker, Stunning Fist, Heal 9 ranks.

sections.body: When you make a successful Stunning Fist attempt against an opponent that is grappled, helpless, or stunned, you can forgo any other Stunning Fist effect to deal 1d6 Strength or Dexterity damage to that opponent.
sections.name: Benefits

description: When your opponent is unable to adequately defend against them, your precise unarmed strikes break bone and tear tissue.
